benchmark_details.name: FB-Bench: A Fine-Grained Multi-Task Benchmark for Evaluating LLMs’ Responsiveness to Human Feedback
benchmark_details.overview: FB-Bench is a fine-grained, multi-task benchmark designed to evaluate LLMs’ responsiveness to human feedback under real-world usage scenarios in Chinese. It comprises 591 meticulously curated samples, encompassing eight task types, five deficiency types of response, and nine feedback types.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To comprehensively evaluate the responsiveness of LLMs to various human feedback across real-world usage scenarios in Chinese.

data.source: The dataset was curated from a combination of online chat services and human preference data, ensuring high task diversity and authenticity.
data.annotation: The data was annotated using a combination of GPT-4o for pre-annotation followed by human annotators for refinement and quality checks.

methodology.calculation: Models are evaluated based on their performance in following up on user feedback with scores determined by a weighted checklist.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better responsiveness to human feedback.
methodology.validation: The benchmark's robustness was validated through a comparison of performance across various popular LLMs.
